body:
Daniel prayed even when the king made a bad rule. God protected Daniel from the lions because Daniel trusted Him.

Discussion: When is it important to obey God even if it's hard?

Jesus used a little boy's lunch (five loaves and two fish) to feed a huge crowd! Jesus can do amazing things.

Takeaway: Even small things we offer can be used by God.
activity: Draw pictures of loaves and fish.
